shortlisted.name: Aarav Mehta
shortlisted.cover_letter:
Dear Hiring Manager,
I am excited to apply for the Software Engineer position at your company. With three years of experience building scalable React and Node.js applications—including a fully functional E-commerce Platform (MERN stack) and a real-time chat application—I am confident in my ability to contribute effectively to your team. My proficiency in Python, Docker, and REST APIs aligns well with your requirements, and I am eager to leverage my full-stack expertise to drive innovation. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my skills can benefit your projects.
Best regards,
Aarav Mehta

shortlisted.name: Kabir Sharma
shortlisted.cover_letter:
Dear Hiring Manager,
I’m excited to apply for the Software Engineer position at your company. With three years of full-stack development experience building scalable web applications (including admin dashboards with MERN stack, JWT authentication, and Dockerized deployments on AWS), I’ve honed skills in **Python (FastAPI), React, and Docker**—directly aligning with your requirements. My project work, such as a **Food Delivery System** and **Stock Price Predictor**, showcases my ability to integrate frontend, backend, and cloud solutions. I’d welcome the opportunity to discuss how my expertise can contribute to your team.
Best regards,
Kabir Sharma

shortlisted.name: Lucas Brown
shortlisted.cover_letter:
Dear Hiring Team,
I’m excited to apply for the Software Engineer position at your company. With my expertise in **React and Next.js**, I’ve successfully developed scalable, server-side rendered applications that improved SEO and performance—directly aligning with your requirements. My experience building dynamic platforms like a Netflix-style streaming service and a news portal with user authentication demonstrates my ability to handle complex frontend challenges while ensuring robustness through testing (Jest). While my background is primarily frontend-focused, my skills in **Node.js, PostgreSQL, and backend integration** make me a strong candidate for roles requiring both frontend and backend collaboration. I’d welcome the opportunity to contribute my technical skills and problem-solving mindset to your team.
Best regards,
Lucas Brown
